title: Predictive Maintenance
description: One of the most effective ways to minimize the impact of Machine Failure on your organization is to become aware of any impending maintenance requirement using ML. By analyzing the data from sensors and training an ML model, an org can predict when maintenance is needed allowing organizations to perform repairs on time, minimize downtime and reduce costsâ€‹. In this app simply set the desired input features and click the "Run Model" button. The input features will then be sent to the model to obtain predictions, and the results will be displayed here. Feel free to explore and observe the behavior of the model by tweaking the input.
